alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Basin; Eastern Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:43PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Uintah County through 415 PM MDT... At 343 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Whiterocks, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Uintah County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Uinta Basin; Eastern Uinta Mountains
